com.android.rhtunning
类 TunningActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.android.rhtunning.TunningActivity

public class TunningActivity
extends Activity

A TunningActivity object represents the main activity of the Erhu Tunning activity.

嵌套类摘要
（专用软件包）  class TunningActivity.DrawImage
          The DrawImage object is used to draw the current frequency on the canvas with a new thread.
 class TunningActivity.FFT
          The FFT class is used to get the result of Fast Fourier Transfer.
（专用软件包）  class TunningActivity.GetFrequency
          The GetFrequency object is used to get the current frequency of the input sound in a thread.
（专用软件包）  class TunningActivity.MyCallBack
          A MyCallBack object is used to start the DrawImage thread and the GetFrequency thread after the surface is created.
 
字段摘要
（专用软件包）  short[] audioSamples
          Used to store the audio samples from microphone input.
（专用软件包）  int currentFrequency
          The real-time frequency.
（专用软件包）  Handler handler
          Timing for ads showing.
（专用软件包）  boolean isAudioAvaliable
          If isAudioAvaliable is true, it means that the AudioRecorder is ready to record.
（专用软件包）  boolean isDrawingAllowed
          If isDrawingAllowed is true, it means that the canvas is ready to draw.
（专用软件包）  int[] lines2Draw
          The positions in the lines of the basic degree scales to draw.
（专用软件包）  int minBytes
          The min bytes of the audio recorder can read in one time.
（专用软件包）  TunningActivity.DrawImage myDrawImage
          The DrawImage object is used to draw the current frequency on the canvas with a new thread.
（专用软件包）  int offset
          The offset between the standard frequency and the current frequency ranging from -60 to 60.
（专用软件包）  AudioRecord record
          Object to get the audio from microphone input.
（专用软件包）  java.lang.Runnable runnable
           
（专用软件包）  int sampleRate
          The sample rate to read from the audio recorder.
（专用软件包）  SurfaceHolder sfh
          Surface holder which is to hold the surface view.
（专用软件包）  SurfaceView sfv
          Surface view where the graph of frequency will be drawn.
（专用软件包）  int standardInside
          Standard frequency of the inside string.
（专用软件包）  int standardOutside
          Standard frequency of the outside string.
（专用软件包）  int xlen
          The width of the current screen.
（专用软件包）  int ylen
          The height of the current screen.

Surface holder which is to hold the surface view.

TunningActivity.DrawImage myDrawImage
The DrawImage object is used to draw the current frequency on the canvas with a new thread.

lines2Draw

int[] lines2Draw
The positions in the lines of the basic degree scales to draw.

offset

int offset
The offset between the standard frequency and the current frequency ranging from -60 to 60.

currentFrequency

int currentFrequency
The real-time frequency.

xlen

int xlen
The width of the current screen.

ylen

int ylen
The height of the current screen.

isDrawingAllowed

boolean isDrawingAllowed
If isDrawingAllowed is true, it means that the canvas is ready to draw. It is also used in the control of multi-threading.

isAudioAvaliable

boolean isAudioAvaliable
If isAudioAvaliable is true, it means that the AudioRecorder is ready to record. It is also used in the control of multi-threading.

record

AudioRecord record
Object to get the audio from microphone input.

sampleRate

int sampleRate
The sample rate to read from the audio recorder.

minBytes

int minBytes
The min bytes of the audio recorder can read in one time.

audioSamples

short[] audioSamples
Used to store the audio samples from microphone input.

handler

Handler handler
Timing for ads showing.

runnable

java.lang.Runnable runnable
构造方法详细信息

TunningActivity

public TunningActivity()
方法详细信息

onCreate

protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
onCreate is where you initialize your activity. Here it will initialize the surface, audio, as well as the ads.

参数：
savedInstanceState - If the activity is being re-initialized after previously being shut down then this Bundle contains the data it most recently supplied in onSaveInstanceState(Bundle). Note: Otherwise it is null.

onCreateOptionsMenu

public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
Initialize the contents of the Activity's standard options menu. You should place your menu items in to menu. This is only called once, the first time the options menu is displayed. To update the menu every time it is displayed, see onPrepareOptionsMenu(Menu).

onKeyDown

public boolean onKeyDown(int keyCode,
                         KeyEvent event)
Called when a key was pressed down and not handled by any of the views inside of the activity. When the BACK key is triggered, the threads of the activity will stop, remove the timer and release all kinds of resources.

log

protected void log(java.lang.String str)

showAds

protected void showAds()
